text: This project, BIPM.RI(II)-digP1, involves the measurement of a 60Co liquid scintillation source acquired using the BIPM 4π(TDCR)β-NaI(γ) coincidence counting system #1. The measurand is the activity at the reference date. All details are available in the metadata.csv file. The deadline to submit your results is December, 15, 2026.
